column3: 2015) send sympathy card ellen frances (smith) jarvis
column8: 2015 at her home. frances was born on november 2
column10: in to charles and gracie (hawkins) smith. frances attended the church of god mission in mt. vernon. she enjoyed reading the bible
column13: and spending time with her grandkids. she was preceded in death by her parents; husband
column15: gusta brown. she is survived by her sons
column19: peony rose smith and tina keown of mt. vernon
column21: ernest (judy) smith and harry (kelly) smith both of evansville
column22: in and paul smith of chandler
column26: and peggy (mike) gentery all of boonville
column34: and edna marie morrow of mo; grandchildren
column46: and donald; many nieces and nephews. funeral service will be held at 1:00 pm tuesday
column50: in with rev. william carlyle officiating and burial to follow in old beech cemetery. visitation will be held from 10:00 am until 1:00 pm service time at the funeral home. memorial contributions may be made to posey humane society. print back express your condolences contact us get mobile version privacy terms of use 2010 - 2015 schneider funeral home funeral home website by batesville
